purpose: Analyze Twitter user data to provide MBTI personality type insights
principle: Utilizes Twitter API to fetch user data and apply personality analysis algorithms
reusability: Can be integrated into other applications via API for personality analysis based on social media data
limitations: Dependent on Twitter API access, analysis limited to available Twitter data, potential inaccuracies in personality assessment
name: twi.am
highlight: Generates MBTI personality insights from Twitter data
